attributes.additional_details:
I am simply appalled that the number of people who have been either seriously injured or indeed sadly who lose their life while they are using the A38.

This matter has been brought to my attention recently after a friend of mine was killed on this very dangerous road.

I appropriate that the A38 is a very long road as it reaches from Cornwall to Nottingham which is a total of 292 miles in length and I want to see the Transport Department reviewing the safety of the A38 to see where it is possible to improve the road further.
